name: Space Siege (itch)
description:
Escape from pirates who invaded SS Squidward. 

Move around with ASDW, point using your mouse and shoot with right click. 

All monsters have different habilities, be careful as you move forward. 

Solve the puzzle, after defeating a Boss you'll get to solve a puzzle, shoot the buttons following the same pattern as the master button.

If it happens to be so intense for you, feel free to pause the game pressing (P) or (Esc)

Available for MacOS and Windows.
